trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Move-Item
trans-unit.target: Move-Item

trans-unit.source: Move-Item
trans-unit.target: Move-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Moves an item from one location to another.
trans-unit.target: 将项从一个位置移动到另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Move-Item cmdlet moves an item, including its properties, contents, and child items, from one location to another location.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item cmdlet 将项（包括其属性、内容以及子项）从一个位置移动到另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: The locations must be supported by the same provider.
trans-unit.target: 但这些位置必须由同一提供程序支持。

trans-unit.source: For example, it can move a file or subdirectory from one directory to another or move a registry subkey from one key to another.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以将文件或子目录从一个目录移动到另一个目录，或将注册表子项从一个项移动到另一个项。

trans-unit.source: When you move an item, it is added to the new location and deleted from its original location.
trans-unit.target: 在你移动某个项时，该属性将被添加到新位置，并从其原来的位置删除。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command moves the Test.txt file from the C: drive to the E:\Temp directory and renames it from "test.txt" to "tst.txt".
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 Test.txt 文件从 C: 驱动器移动到 E:\Temp 目录，并将其由“test.txt”重命名为“tst.txt”。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the C:\Temp directory and its contents to the C:\Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 C:\Temp 目录及其内容移动到 C:\Logs 目录下。

trans-unit.source: The Temp directory, and all of its subdirectories and files, then appear in the Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: Temp 目录及其所有子目录和文件随后将显示在 Logs 目录下。

trans-unit.source: This command moves all of the text files (*.txt) in the current directory (represented by a dot (.)) to the C:\Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前目录（由句点 (.) 表示）中的所有文本文件 (*.txt) 移动到 C:\Logs 目录。

trans-unit.source: This command moves all of the text files from the current directory and all subdirectories, recursively, to the C:\TextFiles directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将所有文本文件从当前目录及其所有子目录递归地移动到 C:\TextFiles 目录下。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-ChildItem cmdlet to get all of the child items in the current directory (represented by the dot \[.\]) and its subdirectories that have a *.txt file name extension. It uses the Recurse parameter to make the retrieval recursive and the Include parameter to limit the retrieval to *.txt files.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-childitem cmdlet 以在当前目录中获取的所有子项目 (由圆点表示 \[。\]) 及其子目录中具有 *.txt 文件扩展名。它使用 Recurse 参数使检索递归和 Include 参数来限制检索到 *.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) sends the results of this command to Move-Item, which moves the text files to the TextFiles directory.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符 (|) 将此命令的结果发送给 Move-Item，后者将文本文件移动到 TextFiles 目录下。

trans-unit.source: If files being moved to C:\Textfiles have the same name, Move-Item displays an error and continues, but it moves only one file with each name to C:\Textfiles.
trans-unit.target: 如果正移到 C:\Textfiles 的文件具有相同名称，则 Move-Item 会显示错误并继续执行，但只将具有不同名称的文件移到 C:\Textfiles。

trans-unit.source: The other files remain in their original directories.
trans-unit.target: 其他文件仍保留在其原始目录下。

trans-unit.source: If the Textfiles directory (or any other element of the destination path) does not exist, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Textfiles 目录（或目标路径的任何其他元素）不存在，则该命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: The missing directory is not created for you, even if you use the Force parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它不会为你创建缺少的目录，即使使用 Force 参数也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Move-Item moves the first item to a file called "Textfiles" and then displays an error explaining that the file already exists.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item 会将第一项移到一个名为“Textfiles”的文件中，然后显示一个错误，指出该文件已存在。

trans-unit.source: Also, by default, Get-ChildItem does not move hidden files.
trans-unit.target: 此外，默认情况下，Get-ChildItem 不移动隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: To move hidden files, use the Force parameter with Get-ChildItem.
trans-unit.target: 若要移动隐藏文件，请对 Get-ChildItem 使用 Force 参数。

trans-unit.source: Note: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, when using the **Recurse** parameter of the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, the value of the **Path** parameter must be a container.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，当使用 **Recurse** Get-childitem cmdlet，值的参数 **路径** 参数必须是一个容器。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Include** parameter to specify the .txt file name extension filter (`Get-ChildItem -Path .\* -Include *.txt -Recurse | Move-Item -Destination C:\TextFiles`).
trans-unit.target: 使用 **包括** 参数来指定.txt 文件扩展名筛选器 (`Get-ChildItem -Path .\* -Include *.txt -Recurse | Move-Item -Destination C:\TextFiles`)。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the registry keys and values within the MyCompany registry key in HKLM\Software to the MyNewCompany key.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 HKLM\Software 中 MyCompany 注册表项中的注册表项及其值移动到 MyNewCompany 项。

trans-unit.source: The wildcard character (*) indicates that the contents of the MyCompany key should be moved, not the key itself.
trans-unit.target: 通配符 (*) 指示应移动 MyCompany 项的内容，而非移动项本身。

trans-unit.source: In this command, the optional Path and Destination parameter names are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 此命令中省略了可选的 Path 和 Destination 参数名。

trans-unit.source: This command moves the Logs\[Sept\`06\] directory (and its contents) into the Logs\[2006\] directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将日志移\[年 9 月\`06\] 目录 （和其内容） 到日志\[2006年\] 目录。

trans-unit.source: The LiteralPath parameter is used instead of Path, because the original directory name includes left bracket and right bracket characters ("\[" and "\]").
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath 参数可用于代替 Path，因为原始目录名称包含左的方括号和右方括号字符 ("\["和"\]")。

trans-unit.source: The path is also enclosed in single quotation marks (' '), so that the backtick symbol (\`) is not misinterpreted.
trans-unit.target: 路径也括在单引号 (' ')，以便反引号符号 (\`) 不被错误解释。

trans-unit.source: The Destination parameter does not require a literal path, because the Destination variable also must be enclosed in single quotation marks, because it includes brackets that can be misinterpreted.
trans-unit.target: Destination 参数不需要文本路径，因为 Destination 变量也必须括在单引号中，因为它包括可能被曲解的方括号。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，如“User01”或“Domain01\User01”；或输入 PSCredential 对象，如 Get-Credential cmdlet 输入的一个 PSCredential 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Destination
trans-unit.target: -目标

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the location where the items are being moved.
trans-unit.target: 指定指向要移动其中的项的位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted, but the result must specify a single location.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符，但结果必须指定单个位置。

trans-unit.source: To rename the item being moved, specify a new name in the value of the Destination parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要重命名正移动的项，请在 Destination 参数的值中指定新名称。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Omits the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 忽略指定项。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数值使 Path 参数有效。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径元素或模式，例如“*.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 筛选器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供程序的格式或语言指定筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数值使 Path 参数有效。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的语法（包括通配符的使用）取决于提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器比其他参数更有效，因为提供程序是在检索对象时应用筛选器，而不是在检索对象后再由 Windows PowerShell 筛选对象。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to move an item that writes over an existing read-only item.
trans-unit.target: 允许 cmdlet 移动项以覆盖现有只读项。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 不同提供程序有不同的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 参数，该 cmdlet 也无法覆盖安全限制。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Moves only the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 只移动指定项。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数值使 Path 参数有效。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径元素或模式，例如“*.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the current location of the items.
trans-unit.target: 指定指向项的当前位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与 Path 不同，LiteralPath 的值严格按照所键入的形式使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Passes an object representing the item to the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 将表示项的对象传递到管道。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the current location of the items.
trans-unit.target: 指定指向项的当前位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to Move-Item.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将包含路径的字符串传递给 Move-Item。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or an object representing the moved item.
trans-unit.target: 无或表示已移动的项的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the Passthru parameter, Move-Item generates an object representing the moved item.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Passthru 参数，则 Move-Item 生成一个表示已移动项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Move-Item will move files between drives that are supported by the same provider, but it will move directories only within the same drive.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item 将在由同一提供程序支持的驱动器之间移动文件，但它只在同一驱动器内移动目录。

trans-unit.source: Because a Move-Item command moves the properties, contents, and child items of an item, all moves are recursive by default.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Move-Item 命令移动项的属性、内容和子项，所以，默认情况下，所有移动都是递归的。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Move-Item by its built-in aliases, "move", "mv", and "mi".
trans-unit.target: 还可以通过 Move-Item 的内置别名“move”、“mv”以及“mi”来对其进行引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: The Move-Item cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item cmdlet 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入“Get-PsProvider”。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: New-Item

trans-unit.target: Remove-Item

trans-unit.target: Rename-Item
